Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in San Bartolome de Tirajana (San Agustin), IFA Interclub Atlantic Hotel is convenient to El Aguila Beach and Playa de San Agustin. This all-inclusive hotel is within close proximity of Las Burras Beach and Kasbah Shopping Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 420 guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with bathtubs are provided.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or make use of the other amenities, which include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
This hotel is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of IFA Interclub Atlantic Hotel. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and an elevator (lift). A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
This hotel is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of IFA Interclub Atlantic Hotel. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Pamper yourself with onsite massages or make use of the other amenities, which include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Located in San Bartolome de Tirajana (San Agustin), IFA Interclub Atlantic Hotel is convenient to El Aguila Beach and Playa de San Agustin. This all-inclusive hotel is within close proximity of Las Burras Beach and Kasbah Shopping Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

El Aguila Beach - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Las Burras Beach - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Kasbah Shopping Center - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Yumbo Shopping Center - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
CITA Shopping Center - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Meloneras Beach - 8.1 km / 5 mi
Palmitos Park - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi
Puerto Rico Shopping Center - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi

The preferred airport for IFA Interclub Atlantic Hotel is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 23.2 km / 14.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for IFA Interclub Atlantic Hotel is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 23.3 km / 14.5 mi.
